roleset.name: dwindle. (no particle)
roleset.note: PETER-V NOTES: Added by Julia. No VNcls. Comparison to 'taper'. (from peter.01-v)

roles.note: If this ever comes up there is a tiny chance it could (from peter.01-v)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The last remaining bonanza in the Con. Virginia had petered, the stock had gone to smash, other stocks had faded from sight-- two hundred millions of property which three weeks before would have bought houses and lands and ships and goods and bank-shares had been absolutely wiped out of existence, had evaporated into air.
example.arg: The last remaining bonanza in the Con. Virginia

roleset.name: dwindle to nothing
roleset.note: PETER_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from peter.02-v)

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: A spell of snow should affect northern and highland scotland and gradually peter out to rain as it does so .

example.name: with arg0
example.text: I also petered it out a bit at the end...I'm guessing the last 5 pills were taken every other day.
